message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my offer?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $18,000 is already a competitive price for this product and its value. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,500. Can you consider this offer?
